snippet: A Pennsylvania congressman's press secretary has pleaded not guilty to a weapons charge after Capitol police say he carried a gun into a federal office building in Washington....

headline.print_headline: Congressman's Staffer Denies Guilt in Gun Case
headline.main: Congressman's Staffer Denies Guilt in Gun Case

lead_paragraph: A Pennsylvania congressman's press secretary has pleaded not guilty to a weapons charge after Capitol police say he carried a gun into a federal office building in Washington.
